{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=C3000 |revision=v2 |asin=B00IF0JAIU |newegg=N82E16825124008 |fcc_date=05/04/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=PY316100336 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3383G;QAMLink(R), BCM3383GKFEBG, TE1529 P20, E2PB-02 N3B1; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L8006EM2I-12G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-15 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43227;BCM43227KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54612E |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX, |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|N300 WiFi Cable Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/C3000.aspx}} <!--{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=C3000v2}}--> <!--{{FCC ST|10/31/2017|indexme.}}-->
"C3000/C3700/C6220 REV:1.04" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Web GUI: http://routerlogin.net
DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 (340 Mbps)<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
